personality_traits: I always have a plan for what to do when things go wrong.
I am always calm, no matter what the situation.
I fall in and out of love easily, and am always pursuing someone.
I have a joke for every occasion, especially inappropriate ones.
I am incredibly slow to trust. Those who seem fairest often have the most to hide.
I don't pay attention to the risks in a situation. Never tell me the odds!
I blow up at the slightest insult.
I pocket anything I see that might have some value.
I would rather make a new friend than a new enemy.
I'm always polite and respectful, even to my enemies.
I've read every book in the world's greatest libraries.
I'm used to helping out those who aren't as smart as I am.
Nothing can shake my optimistic attitude.
I can find common ground between the fiercest enemies.
I judge people by their actions, not their words.
If someone is in trouble, I'm always ready to lend help.
I sleep with my back to a wall, with everything I own strapped to my body.
I eat like a pig and have bad manners.
I think anyone who's nice to me is hiding evil intent.
I don't like to bathe.
Sarcasm and insults are my weapons of choice.
I change my mood or my mind as quickly as I change key in a song.
I'm oblivious to etiquette and social expectations.
I connect everything that happens to me to a grand, cosmic plan.
I often get lost in my own thoughts and contemplation.
I am working on a grand philosophical theory.
I'm horribly jealous of anyone who can outshine me.
I've spent so long in the temple that I have little practical experience.
I quote sacred texts and proverbs in almost every situation.
Flattery is my preferred trick for getting what I want.
I'm confident in my own abilities and do what I can to instill confidence in others.
I hide scraps of food and trinkets away in my pockets.
I ask a lot of questions.
I like to squeeze into small places where no one else can get to me.
I bluntly say what others are hinting at or hiding.
I feel far more comfortable around animals than people.
I was raised by wolves, or so I claim.
The common folk love me for my kindness.
No one could doubt by looking at my regal bearing that I am a cut above.
I take great pains to always look my best.
Despite my noble birth, I do not place myself above other folk.
I'm driven by a wanderlust that led me away from home.
I watch over my friends as if they were a litter of newborn pups.
I place no stock in wealthy or well-mannered folk.
I misuse long words in an attempt to sound smarter.
I get bored easily. When am I going to get on with my destiny?
I have a strong sense of fair play.
I'm always picking things up, absently fiddling with them.
I know a story relevant to almost every situation.
Whenever I come to a new place, I collect local rumors.

ideals.description: My gifts are meant to be shared with all, not used for my own benefit.
People deserve to be treated with dignity and respect.
No one should get preferential treatment before the law.
If I dishonor myself, I dishonor my whole family.
The ancient traditions of worship and sacrifice must be preserved.
I always try to help those in need, no matter what the cost.
We must help bring about the changes the gods are constantly working in the world.
I hope to one day rise to the top of my faith's hierarchy.
I trust that my deity will guide my actions. I have faith that if I work hard, things will go well.
I seek to prove myself worthy of my god's favor by matching my actions against their teachings.
I am a free spirit - no one tells me what to do.
I will do whatever it takes to become wealthy.
I'm loyal to my friends, not to any ideals.
There's a spark of good in everyone.
When I perform, I make the world better than it was.
Everyone should be free to pursue their own livelihood.
The world is in need of new ideas and bold action.
There's no good pretending to be something I'm not.
The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge.
The goal of a life of study is the betterment of oneself.
Emotions must not cloud our sense of what is right and true.
Nothing should fetter the infinite possibility inherent in all existence.
Nothing and no one can steer me away from my higher calling.
It is the duty of all civilized people to strengthen the bonds of community.
Meddling in others' affairs only causes trouble.
If I become strong, I can take what I want.
The natural world is more important than all the constructs of civilization.
I must earn glory in battle, for myself and my clan.
My city, nation, or people are all that matter.
It is my duty to protect and care for the people beneath me.

bonds: I would die to recover an ancient relic that was lost long ago.
I will someday get revenge on the corrupt temple hierarchy who branded me a heretic.
I owe my life to the priest who took me in when my parents died.
Everything I do is for the common people.
I will do anything to protect the temple where I served.
I seek to preserve a sacred text that my enemies seek to destroy.
My instrument is my most treasured possession, a reminder of someone I love.
Someone stole my precious instrument, and someday I'll get it back.
I want to be famous, whatever it takes.
I idolize a hero of the old tales and measure my deeds against theirs.
I will become the greatest thief that ever lived.
I'm guilty of a terrible crime. I hope I can redeem myself for it.
Someone I loved died because of a mistake I made.
I escaped my life of poverty by robbing an important person.
My ill-gotten gains go to support my family.
Something important was taken from me, and I aim to steal it back.
I have a family, but I have no idea where they are.
I swindled and ruined a person who didn't deserve it.
My town or city is my home, and I'll fight to defend it.
I sponsor an orphanage to keep others from enduring what I was forced to endure.
I owe everything to my mentor - a horrible person who's probably rotting in jail.
I come from a noble family, and one day I'll reclaim my lands and title.
My family, clan, or tribe is the most important thing in my life.
An injury to the unspoiled wilderness of my home is an injury to me.
I am in love with the heir of a family that my family despises.
I will face any challenge to win the approval of my family.
The common folk must see me as a hero of the people.
I protect those who cannot protect themselves.
I entered seclusion to hide from those who might still be hunting me.
I'm still seeking the enlightenment I pursued in my seclusion.
flaws: I judge others harshly, and myself even more severely.
I put too much trust in those who wield power within my temple's hierarchy.
My piety sometimes leads me to blindly trust those that profess faith in my god.
I am inflexible in my thinking.
I am suspicious of strangers and expect the worst of them.
Once I pick a goal, I become obsessed with it to the detriment of everything else.
I'll do anything to win fame and renown.
I'm a sucker for a pretty face.
A scandal prevents me from ever going home again.
I once satirized a noble who still wants my head.
I have trouble keeping my true feelings hidden.
I can't resist swindling people who are more powerful than me.
I can't resist a pretty face.
I'm always in debt. I spend my ill-gotten gains on decadent luxuries.
I can't resist taking a risk if there's money involved.
I have a 'tell' that reveals when I'm lying.
I turn tail and run when things look bad.
An innocent person is in prison for a crime that I committed.
I will never fully trust anyone other than myself.
I'd rather kill someone in their sleep than fight fair.
It's not stealing if I need it more than someone else.
People who can't take care of themselves get what they deserve.
I am dogmatic in my thoughts and philosophy.
I let my need to win arguments overshadow friendships and harmony.
I overlook obvious solutions in favor of complicated ones.
I speak without really thinking through my words, invariably insulting others.
I follow orders, even if I think they're wrong.
I'll say anything to avoid having to do extra work.
I remember every insult I've received and nurse a silent resentment.
I am slow to trust members of other races, tribes, and societies.
Violence is my answer to almost any challenge.
Don't expect me to save those who can't save themselves.
I secretly believe that everyone is beneath me.
I hide a truly scandalous secret that could ruin my family forever.
I too often hear veiled insults and threats in every word addressed to me.
I have an insatiable desire for carnal pleasures.
In fact, the world does revolve around me.
By my words and actions, I often bring shame to my family.
I am too enamored of ale, wine, and other intoxicants.
I harbor dark, bloodthirsty thoughts that my isolation failed to quell.
motivations: Seeks revenge against someone who wronged them
Searches for a lost family member
Wants to prove their worth to someone
Searches for a cure to a disease/curse
Wants to overthrow a corrupt authority
Seeks to restore their family's honor
Wants to complete a sacred mission
Wants to leave a lasting legacy
Seeks to break a family curse
Wants to reunite a broken group
Desires to serve a higher power
Wants to destroy an ancient evil

speech: Uses lots of hand gestures while talking
Has a catchphrase they repeat often
physical: Has a distinctive walk (limp, swagger, etc.)

distinctive: Has a pet always with them
Has an unusual smell (pleasant or not)

secrets: Is actually a spy for a rival faction
Has committed a murder that was never solved
Is secretly in love with someone forbidden
Has a hidden stash of stolen goods
Is being blackmailed
Has a secret identity as a vigilante
Is addicted to a substance
Has made a deal with a devil/demon
Is actually a shapeshifter/doppelganger
Knows the location of a hidden treasure
Has a terminal illness they hide from others
Is heir to a noble house but in hiding
Witnessed a crime but is too afraid to speak
Is secretly working to overthrow the local government
Has a forbidden magical ability they hide
Is actually much older than they appear
Has a child no one knows about
Is planning to betray their employer
Knows embarrassing secrets about important people
Is wanted for crimes in another region
Has been replaced by an imposter (the real one is missing)
Is secretly illiterate but pretends otherwise
Has a gambling addiction with massive debts
Is the bastard child of nobility
Serves a secret cult
Has information that could start a war
Is plotting revenge against the party or their allies
Has a cursed item they can't get rid of
Is actually dead and doesn't know it (ghost)
Knows the true identity of a famous hero/villain
